_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
rationale: High IV rank, selling premium in range-bound market

entry_conditions.notes: Best when IV is elevated (sell expensive premium) and market is range-bound. Avoid during trending markets or ahead of major catalysts.

pnl_drivers.max_profit: Net credit received (both spreads expire OTM)
pnl_drivers.max_loss: Width of widest spread - net credit
pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Theta decay â€” time value erosion on 4 short/long options
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: IV crush â€” vega negative position profits from volatility contraction

greeks_profile.theta: positive â€” profits from time decay every day
greeks_profile.vega: negative â€” profits from IV decrease
greeks_profile.delta: near neutral at entry â€” no directional bias
greeks_profile.gamma: negative â€” risk increases as price approaches short strikes

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Price stays between short strikes, IV contracts, collect full credit at expiry.
